name: Ginger Lemon Hummus
description: A zesty twist on the classic hummus, our ginger lemon version is a tantalizing blend of Mediterranean tradition and Asian zest, perfect for a light and healthy appetizer.
ingredients: Chickpeas, tahini, ginger, lemon, olive oil, pita bread

name: Silken Tofu Caprese
description: Reimagining the classic Caprese, our version introduces silken tofu to the mix, creating a refreshing and light fusion dish, perfect for a sophisticated starter.
ingredients: Silken tofu, tomatoes, fresh basil, sesame oil, olive oil

name: Empire Eggplant Tempura
description: A crispy, savory delight, our eggplant tempura is given a Mediterranean twist with feta and sun-dried tomatoes, all united by a delicate miso glaze.
ingredients: Eggplant, feta cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, tempura batter, miso glaze

name: Olive Dragon Roll
description: A daring fusion of East and West, these sushi rolls combine the bold flavors of olive tapenade and spicy tuna, wrapped in fresh cucumber for a crisp, refreshing bite.
ingredients: Cucumber, olive tapenade, spicy tuna, avocado, sesame seeds, balsamic reduction

name: Saffron Sashimi Symphony
description: Experience the delicate harmony of fresh sashimi, subtly enhanced with the luxurious touch of saffron and a citrusy soy emulsion, crafting an unforgettable melody of flavors.
ingredients: Salmon, tuna, yellowtail, saffron, microgreens, soy sauce, lemon juice

name: Aegean Sushi Platter
description: An adventurous exploration of flavors, our Aegean Sushi Platter brings the essence of the Mediterranean to traditional sushi, with ingredients like grilled octopus and tzatziki.
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, grilled octopus, tzatziki, feta cheese, cucumber, olives

name: Zen Garden Risotto
description: A tranquil blend of East meets West, our green tea-infused risotto is complemented with grilled seasonal vegetables, offering a serene, flavorful escape.
ingredients: Green tea, arborio rice, grilled vegetables, edible flowers, herbs

name: MediterrAsian Sea Breeze
description: A luxurious blend of the ocean's bounty, featuring grilled scallops and shrimp, harmoniously paired with saffron-infused risotto, combining the best of Mediterranean and Asian flavors.
ingredients: Grilled scallops, shrimp, saffron risotto, seaweed, lemon zest, olive oil, garlic, herbs

name: Lotus Pad Thai
description: A delightful fusion, our Lotus Pad Thai reinvents the classic with Mediterranean ingredients, blending lotus root noodles with the tangy tastes of sun-dried tomatoes and olives.
ingredients: Lotus root noodles, sun-dried tomatoes, kalamata olives, feta cheese, Pad Thai sauce

name: Bamboo Baklava
description: An exotic take on the traditional baklava, our bamboo-infused version adds an Asian flair to this beloved Mediterranean dessert, creating a sweet, unforgettable finish.
ingredients: Phyllo pastry, mixed nuts, bamboo shoots, honey, butter
